name: 三国英雄列传 (Legendary Heros in the Three Kingdoms)
description: Legendary Heros in the Three Kingdoms is a strategy sandbox game of Sanguo hero's fantasy story. Player can play the role of any one of more than three hundred officers in Sanguo's history. Player's troop grow stronger by adventures and attack bandits, then defeat the twenty-odd lords in the world of Sanguo, and recruit their officers.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Процессор: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 1024x768 High Color + Место на диске: 1 GB
